messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Hagakure crest ?
messages.msgSnippet: Unfortunately I can not answer your question regarding the crest, but I too have just read the book (for the fifth time i think..) an I LOVE IT!! So, hwat I
messages.messageBody:
Unfortunately I can not answer your question regarding the crest, but I
too have just read the book (for the fifth time i think..) an I LOVE IT!!
So, hwat I would like to knowe is wether someone has a recommendation for
a book along the same kind of line - maybe something more on the art af
warfare and tactics...??

My appologies for adding a question to a question.

tobias

messages.subject: Hagakure crest ?
messages.msgSnippet: I just finished reading the Hagakure by Yamamoto Tsunemoto , and I was wondering what the signifigance of the crest on the cover of the book was.  Is it a
messages.messageBody:
I just finished reading the 'Hagakure' by Yamamoto Tsunemoto , and I
was wondering what the signifigance of the crest on the cover of the
book was. Is it a family crest or some sort of symbol for something?
If anyone could answer my question I would greatly appreciate it.
